src:
Prediksi Real Madrid vs Real Betis 3 November 2019
01 Nov 2019, 17:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Selama beberapa musim terakhir, Real Madrid sering kerepotan setiap kali melawan Real Betis. Namun, jika Madrid kembali tampil buas seperti ketika menghabisi Leganes, Betis seharusnya bisa diatasi.
Peringkat 2 Real Madrid akan menjamu peringkat 16 Real Betis di Santiago Bernabeu pada pekan ke-12 La Liga 2019/20, Minggu (03/11/2019). Madrid saat ini tertinggal satu poin di belakang Barcelona.
Di tempat ini musim lalu, Madrid dipaksa menyerah 0-2 oleh Betis lewat gol-gol Loren Moron dan Jese. Dengan hasil itu, berarti Madrid selalu kalah dalam dua laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Betis di La Liga. Mereka juga dipermalukan 0-1 pada musim 2017/18.
Betis masih berpotensi merepotkan. Tengah pekan kemarin, Betis memutus rentetan empat pertandingan tanpa kemenangan di La Liga dengan mengalahkan Celta Vigo 2-1. Betis menang melalui gol-gol Emerson dan Nabil Fekir.
Itu tentu membuat Betis percaya diri menatap lawatan ke Bernabeu. Namun, Los Verdiblancos harus siaga penuh.
Pasalnya, Madrid sedang sangat bergairah menyusul kemenangan telak 5-0 menjamu Leganes. Rodrygo dan Toni Kroos menyumbang masing-masing satu gol. Karim Benzema dan kapten Sergio Ramos masing-masing mencetak satu gol penalti.
Tak kalah penting, Luka Jovic akhirnya mencetak gol perdana dengan seragam Madrid, di penampilannya yang ke-10.
Madrid perlu menjaga momentum positif ini, terutama sebelum meladeni Galatasaray di Liga Champions tengah pekan nanti. Los Blancos wajib mengalahkan Betis dan mengamankan tiga poin.
text:
Prediction of Real Madrid vs Real Betis 3 November 2019
Nov 01 2019, 17:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Over the last few seasons, Real Madrid has been struggling every time against Real Betis. However, if Madrid returns to be as fierce as when eliminating Leganes, Betis should be overcome.
Rank 2 Real Madrid will host 16th Real Betis at the Santiago Bernabeu in Week 12 of La Liga 2019/20, Sunday (11/03/2019). Madrid is currently one point behind Barcelona.
In this place last season, Madrid were forced to give up 0-2 by Betis through goals from Loren Moron and Jese. With that result, it means that Madrid has always lost their last two home games against Betis in La Liga. They were also humiliated 0-1 in the 2017/18 season.
Calves are still potentially troublesome. In the middle of last week, Betis cut off a series of four games without a win in La Liga by beating Celta Vigo 2-1. Betis won through goals from Emerson and Nabil Fekir.
That certainly makes Betis confidently staring on a visit to the Bernabeu. However, Los Verdiblancos must be on full alert.
Because, Madrid is very excited following a 5-0 victory at home to Leganes. Rodrygo and Toni Kroos contributed one goal each. Karim Benzema and captain Sergio Ramos each scored one penalty.
No less important, Luka Jovic finally scored his first goal in a Madrid shirt, in his 10th appearance.
Madrid needs to maintain this positive momentum, especially before serving Galatasaray in the midweek Champions League. Los Blancos must beat Betis and secure three points.
